name: One Night at Fredbear's Family Diner
name_original: One Night at Fredbear's Family Diner
description:
Can you survive one night at Fredbear's Family Diner?

(Warning: This is not an original game, only a fan game and nothing in this game is canon to Scott Cawthon's FNAF series) #fnaf #fangame #horror #adult #survival #strategy #other
